response.overview: What could be a better combination for relaxation than a crackling, sparkling, warm fireplace and a contentedly purring cat in front of it, experiencing the warmth and atmosphere just as much as the viewer of this DVD? For 60 minutes, you can enjoy the feel-good atmosphere of this DVD â€“ optionally with the original sound of the fireplace or with gentle, classical piano pieces by Chopin that will transform your living room or studio into an oasis of peace and tranquility.  Let yourself be captivated by the calm and peaceful mood of this DVD.
response.title: Cat by the Fireplace
